To the chief Musician<S>5329</S> upon Jonathelemrechokim<S>3128</S>, Michtam<S>4387</S> of David<S>1732</S>, when the Philistines<S>6430</S> took<S>270</S> him in Gath<S>1661</S>. Be merciful<S>2603</S> unto me, O God<S>430</S>: for man<S>582</S> would swallow me up<S>7602</S>; he fighting<S>3898</S> daily<S>3117</S> oppresseth<S>3905</S> me. <sup>Michtam: or, A golden Psalm of David</sup>
Mine enemies<S>8324</S> would daily<S>3117</S> swallow<S>7602</S> me up: for they be many<S>7227</S> that fight<S>3898</S> against me, O thou most High<S>4791</S>. <sup>enemies: Heb. observers</sup>
What time<S>3117</S> I am afraid<S>3372</S>, I will trust<S>982</S> in thee.
In God<S>430</S> I will praise<S>1984</S> his word<S>1697</S>, in God<S>430</S> I have put my trust<S>982</S>; I will not fear<S>3372</S> what flesh<S>1320</S> can do<S>6213</S> unto me.
Every day<S>3117</S> they wrest<S>6087</S> my words<S>1697</S>: all their thoughts<S>4284</S> are against me for evil<S>7451</S>.
They gather themselves together<S>1481</S>, they hide<S>6845</S> <S>6845</S> themselves, they mark<S>8104</S> my steps<S>6119</S>, when they wait<S>6960</S> for my soul<S>5315</S>.
Shall they escape<S>6405</S> by iniquity<S>205</S>? in thine anger<S>639</S> cast down<S>3381</S> the people<S>5971</S>, O God<S>430</S>.
Thou tellest<S>5608</S> my wanderings<S>5112</S>: put<S>7760</S> thou my tears<S>1832</S> into thy bottle<S>4997</S>: are they not in thy book<S>5612</S>?
When<S>3117</S> I cry<S>7121</S> unto thee, then shall mine enemies<S>341</S> turn<S>7725</S> back<S>268</S>: this I know<S>3045</S>; for God<S>430</S> is for me.
In God<S>430</S> will I praise<S>1984</S> his word<S>1697</S>: in the LORD<S>3068</S> will I praise<S>1984</S> his word<S>1697</S>.
In God<S>430</S> have I put my trust<S>982</S>: I will not be afraid<S>3372</S> what man<S>120</S> can do<S>6213</S> unto me.
Thy vows<S>5088</S> are upon me, O God<S>430</S>: I will render<S>7999</S> praises<S>8426</S> unto thee.
For thou hast delivered<S>5337</S> my soul<S>5315</S> from death<S>4194</S>: wilt not thou deliver my feet<S>7272</S> from falling<S>1762</S>, that I may walk<S>1980</S> before<S>6440</S> God<S>430</S> in the light<S>216</S> of the living<S>2416</S>?
